tool_description: Obtain information about web pages, including the platform on which they are built, the language of the texts they contain, whether it is an e-commerce site, and if it uses the Open Graph standard.

api_list.name: url-analysis
api_list.description: Analyzes a given URL to extract various details about the web page.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the web page to analyze.
